title: Beautiful Faults
description: When renowned gynecologist, Harry Oâ€™Neil, was involved in an accident that took away the best of things that mattered most to him, he willed himself away from light. When June Sandler moved to the big city, she had big dreams, but when she returned to their small town five years later, she returned as a shadow of her old self, only with a certificate and nightmare that haunts her both day and night.These two brilliant yet scarred souls were brought together by fate when June was hired to nurse Harry. How can one heal the other when they both needed healing?Can two wrongs make a right?An intriguing, uncommon and unusual love story at no sight.
author: Musa Anastasia
